modName: The Largashbur's Pariah - Basic Orc Hut
summary:
This mod add a basic Orc Hut next to the Orcish Stronghold of Largashbur.
Mod in English and/or French, tested, and cleaned with TES5Edit.
Ideal for: An Orc or all sort of Pariah.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Small description
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]This mod add a basic Orc Hut next to the Orcish Stronghold of Largashbur.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Mod in English and/or French, tested, and cleaned with TES5Edit.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Ideal for: An Orc or all sort of Pariah.

[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Long description
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]When I play an Orc, one of the first thing I do is to go to Larghasbur, when I reach the level 9-10.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]For me, it's make sense since Largashbur is not so far to Ivarstead, Ivarstead where we go to complete the Main Quest.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]And I was wondering: ''Why not try to make my (first) house mod here'' ? And here we go !
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Features
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]-- Map Marker,
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]-- The True Nature Of Orcs (Book),
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]-- Orcish Sword,
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]-- Orcish End Table (Safe),
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]-- Arcane Enchanter (Since Orcs have Enchanting),
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]-- Bed,
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]-- Chair,
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]-- Drum (Private joke).
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Notes
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]No navmesh done yet, so you cannot enter the Hut with a follower, the follower will wait outside.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]This mod was mainly done for my own, but I wanted to share it with you, just in case.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]This mod works as intended for me, so don't expect any updates yet, sorry, and sorry for my English.

Required Files
No required files.
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Credits/Mods Used/Recommanded Mods
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Orcish Hut Kit by Markus Liberty // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52289/?
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Vivid Landscapes - Orc and Farmhouses by Hein84 // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60205/?
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]ETAC and/or Immersive Settlements by Pymous // http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33162/?
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Bethesda // The Elder Scrolls
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Thanks
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]Thanks for watching/reading/downloading/anything !
[/i][/b][/size][/color][color=#efefef][size=3][b][i]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-2-1464996565.png[/img]
[/i][/b][/size][/color][b][i]Thank you!
==========
Dirmyg
originalposter[/i][/b]
author: Setvi
